Khonkolor::

Khonkolor felt as if he was the worst bot in all Cybertron's story... 
He transformed to robot mode and was ready to fight...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He listened to megaton's reply ti his question. He still wasn't
> convinced. His time in the 'Great Wars' had tought him one thing. If
> they arn't Autobot/Maximal, human, nebulan, or Junkion, dont trust 
them.
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He looked at Khonklor, with an angry face. One of his 'missing' 
bots had
> been here all along?! He felt stupid. He motioned for Khonklor to
> prepare for battle, against Megaton if needed. He would deal with
> Khonklor later.
